title: How do I copy/transfer photos to an SD card
content:
I have a Pixel 3 and a connected USB SD card reader/writer. 
I can see the card in Files, however can’t figure out how to copy or move my photos to the card. 
I’ve downloaded a couple of apps, however none recognize my reader. 
I am off-grid with limited data connectivity, so uploading to Drive is not an option as I have more than 20GB of photos I want to move.
